name: Orb of Eternal Life - GMTK 2020
description:
You're on your final journey, you can finally see the orb you've always looking for . the orb of eternal life . But it does not as what it seems, your weapon got corrupted by the orb and you can't remove it from your hand.  Survive for as long as you can from the immense power of the orb.

This is an entry for the 2020 GMTK game jam. 

Use WASD or directional keys to move

Special thanks to 0x72 for the tileset
